alert.note: Alert for Essex; Lancaster; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 16 at 3:16PM EDT until July 16 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ESSEX, SOUTHEASTERN RICHMOND, SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND, NORTHWESTERN LANCASTER AND NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND COUNTIES... At 316 PM EDT, Thunderstorms produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2.5 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is likely ongoing. No additional rainfall is expected. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tappahannock, Warsaw, Callao, Robley, Farnham, Haynesville, Kinsale, Sharps, Morattico, Heathsville, Lewisetta, Dunnsville, Westmoreland, Village, Gibeon, Mulch, Emmerton, Downing, Oldhams and Moon Corner. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
